name: Who doesn't want to talk to animals?
name_original: Who doesn't want to talk to animals?
description:
Inspired by episode 8 of Rick and Morty: Morty's Mind Blowers

Play as Morty and try to escape the squirrels to get back to Rick.

Controls:

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move Morty.

Note: Music is known to not play. Currently looking into this bug.
